snippet: The Midnight program of the Tribeca Film Festival will features such science-fiction and horror titles as “Zombeavers” and “Summer of Blood.”
abstract: Mike Hale looks at Midnight program of this year's Tribeca Film Festival, which features science-fiction and horror titles; notes that its programmers stuck with Tribeca tradition, choosing movies that combine low-budget sensibility with high-mindedness.
lead_paragraph: The Midnight program of the Tribeca Film Festival will features such science-fiction and horror titles as “Zombeavers” and “Summer of Blood.”

headline.print_headline: Even Vampires Pass the Velvet Rope
headline.seo: ‘Zombeavers’ and Other Midnight Offerings at Tribeca Festival
headline.main: Even Vampires Pass the Velvet Rope
